channel.title: Special attack error with dragon claws
channel.description:
[code]Error with player 1, Deathly ags java.lang.NullPointerException at client.specialAtk(client.java:17465) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:5615) at client.process(client.java:15305) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Thats the error I had when I try to use the special, that goes into my run.bat[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2009, 05:04:41 pm[/size][hr]BUMPED:
Need help! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2009, 04:38:50 pm[/size][hr]Cmon i need help?![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2009, 04:41:18 pm[/size][hr]NEed help
